responses.content:
```yaml
leads:
  - headline: Improper Access Control on License Generation and Management
    analysis: |
      The license generation and management allow remote attackers to perform unauthorized license changes and possibly other unauthorized actions via unknown vectors. This problem lies in the lack if input validation and unchecked privileged operations across different components.
    cwe: CWE-284 Improper Access Control
    function_names:
      - onEvent
      - addLicense
      - storeGeneratedLicense
    filenames:
      - application-licensing-manager/application-licensing-manager-api/src/main/java/com/xwiki/licensing/internal/DefaultSignedLicenseGenerator.java
      - application-licensing-common/application-licensing-common-api/src/main/java/com/xwiki/licensing/internal/script/LicenseFeatureIdConverter.java
      - application-licensing-common/application-licensing-common-api/src/main/java/com/xwiki/licensing/internal/XmlStringLicenseSerializer.java
    classification: very promising
```

leads.headline: Improper Access Control on License Generation and Management
leads.analysis: The license generation and management allow remote attackers to perform unauthorized license changes and possibly other unauthorized actions via unknown vectors. This problem lies in the lack if input validation and unchecked privileged operations across different components.
